text:
Company Background:
Ruiz, Ritter and Evans is a leading consulting firm specializing in technology solutions for various industries. We pride ourselves on delivering innovative and reliable IT services to our clients.

Job Type:
Full-Time

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Computer Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will possess the necessary qualifications and proficiency in the field, ensuring they meet job criteria and deliver optimal performance. This role involves managing and troubleshooting computer systems, software, and networks.

Primary Responsibilities:
- Install, configure, and maintain computer hardware and software systems.
- Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.
- Ensure system security and data integrity.
- Collaborate with team members to enhance system performance.
- Provide technical support and training to staff.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Proven experience in computer systems management and troubleshooting.
- Certifications such as CompTIA A+, Network+, or similar are preferred.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from $60,000 to $85,000 annually, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Opportunities for professional development and training.
- Generous paid time off and holidays.
- Retirement savings plan with company match.

Join Ruiz, Ritter and Evans and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to excellence in technology solutions.

Application Process:
Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their resume and cover letter detailing their qualifications and experience. We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all qualified individuals.
